participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and creative, Emily is determined to make her dreams come true. She is nurturing and has a strong connection to her family.
participant_1.background: I'm going to sign up for a singing competition and show my parents that I can make a career out of it. I play D&D. I sleep most of the day. Before I was a mom in telecommunications, I was a sniper in the army. My mom would have been proud of me for talking my way out of the ticket.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back with a playful side, Jake is passionate about music and loves spending time with family. He has a soft spot for animals and enjoys outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: I have a brother and sister, but I'm closer to my brother. I'm a bad boyfriend, but I love my cats. I am a violinist. I once got a paper cut on my finger while delivering a shipment to a university. I enjoy being active, and my family is always up for an adventure.

content.text: I'm going to sign up for a singing competition and show my parents that I can make a career out of it.
That's amazing! What kind of music do you sing?
I like to sing country and rock.
Cool! I play the violin and I'm also a pretty good singer.
Really? What kind of music do you play?
I play classical and country music.
Awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to play an instrument.
It's really fun! You should try it sometime.
I will! I'm sure my mom would be proud of me if I learned how to play an instrument.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking and camping with my family. We're always up for an adventure.
That sounds really fun! I love going hiking.
I'm going to go sign up for the singing competition now.
Good luck! I'm sure you'll do great!
